name: GetAvailableDocumentsForOrder
description: Returns a list of available outputs for an order by taking an `OrderID`.

properties.name: Documents
properties.description:
List of order document outputs available for a specific order.
Each document contains information regarding the following categories:

`Receipt`  - physically printing the order invoice
`Paper`    - printing the order invoice on a paper printer
`Email`    - sending the order invoice by email
`Digital`  - providing a downloadable version of the order invoice
`Metadata` - providing information about the order invoice.

The document category contains information on whether it's available for the order
and a reason code in case it's not available.

properties.name: Allowed
properties.description: Allowed is false when this option cannot be used, true otherwise

properties.name: Preferred
properties.description: Indicates if this output should be preferred by the frontend. Can be used to, for example, set a checkbox or radio button by default so the user does not have to toggle it themselves

properties.name: ReasonCode
properties.description: Optional reason code that is included if Allowed is set to false

properties.name: Stations
properties.description: Possbile stations where the document can be output

properties.name: ID
properties.description: ID of the Station in EVA. Can be used directly in services

properties.name: Name
properties.description: Name of the station for display purposes

properties.name: Allowed

properties.name: Code
properties.description: A unique ID identifying this error.

properties.name: Message
properties.description: A human-readable message describing the error.

properties.name: RequestID
properties.description: A unique ID identifying the request. Please provide this ID when contacting support.

properties.name: Type
properties.description: A short description of the error type.

properties.name: ExternalIDs
properties.description: When using the `ExternalIDs` mode, this will hold the resolved external IDs.

properties.name: IsAsyncResultAvailable
properties.description: This is a flag indicating whether the async request is done. If it is `null`, it is not an async service. If it is `false`, the response is not yet available. Do not process the properties in that case. It is is `true` the properties are filled with the result of the call.

properties.name: UnresolvedExternalIDs
properties.description: When using the `ExternalIDs` mode, this will hold the external IDs we couldn't resolve.
